meanings.definition: To give bad advice or counsel.
meanings.sent1: She misadvises her friends on important decisions.
meanings.sent2: He often misadvises his clients on financial matters.
meanings.sent3: The talking parrot misadvises the cat on how to catch a mouse.
meanings.sent4: The faulty GPS misadvises the driver to turn left into a dead-end street.
meanings.sent5: The old book misadvises readers to use outdated medical remedies.

meanings.definition: To offer incorrect guidance or recommendations.
meanings.sent1: The unreliable website misadvises users on the best travel routes.
meanings.sent2: The teacher accidentally misadvises the students on the due date for the assignment.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf misadvises the knight on how to defeat the dragon.
meanings.sent4: The broken compass misadvises the hikers, leading them in circles.
meanings.sent5: The fortune teller misadvises the seeker, predicting a sunny day during a storm.
